name: GLOBAL TRAINING AVIATION, S.L.
about: Global Training Aviation (GTA) is a leading aviation training institution, founded in 2002 and headquartered in Madrid, Spain. With over 20 years of experience, GTA is committed to providing high-quality training solutions, utilizing the latest generation simulation systems and full flight simulators. Partnered with INDRA, a global leader in aviation technology, GTA enhances its training offerings to meet the most demanding challenges in commercial aviation. GTA operates Aeronautical Training Centers in Spain, Indonesia, and Colombia, and complies with EASA regulations and other civil aviation authorities. Our mission is to deliver rigorous, specialized, and forward-thinking training, developing highly qualified pilots who prioritize safety and innovation. With a team of passionate instructors and over 1,400 students annually, GTA ensures every graduate is not only a skilled pilot but also a leader in aviation.
